query:
SELECT a.id, a.nomeArquivo, a.totalFichas, a.totalLojas, a.createdAt, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fichas_identificadas_analise f WHERE f.analiseId = a.id) as fichasGuardadas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM relatorios_analise_loja r WHERE r.analiseId = a.id) as totalRelatorios
FROM analises_fichas_servico a 
ORDER BY a.id DESC 
LIMIT 5
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT a.id, a.nomeArquivo, a.totalFichas, a.totalLojas, a.createdAt, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fichas_identificadas_analise f WHERE f.analiseId = a.id) as fichasGuardadas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM relatorios_analise_loja r WHERE r.analiseId = a.id) as totalRelatorios
FROM analises_fichas_servico a 
ORDER BY a.id DESC 
LIMIT 5
